hi vampire lovers how to play game normally without game being slow here is tutorial go to game skip intro when it gets slow solution is to use alt tab then click options also use alt tab to get it faster enter options and turn off all anisotropic then you can play it there is no big visuals differences at all  when you are playing the game when anisotropic are off there you go works for me  i hope this solution it will be working for you also
